scripts.build: yarn build:atom; yarn build:util; yarn build:core; yarn build:store; yarn build:react;
scripts.test: yarn test:store && yarn test:util && yarn test:react
scripts.publish:all: yarn publish:atom; yarn publish:util; yarn publish:core; yarn publish:store; yarn publish:react;
scripts.publish:atom:beta: yarn workspace @gothub-team/got-atom npm publish --access public --tag beta
scripts.publish:util:beta: yarn workspace @gothub-team/got-util npm publish --access public --tag beta
scripts.publish:core:beta: yarn workspace @gothub-team/got-core npm publish --access public --tag beta
scripts.publish:store:beta: yarn workspace @gothub-team/got-store npm publish --access public --tag beta
scripts.publish:react:beta: yarn workspace @gothub-team/got-react npm publish --access public --tag beta
scripts.publish:all:beta: yarn publish:atom:beta; yarn publish:util:beta; yarn publish:core:beta; yarn publish:store:beta; yarn publish:react:beta;
scripts.bump:patch: yarn patch:atom; yarn patch:util; yarn patch:core; yarn patch:store; yarn patch:react; yarn version patch; yarn tag:version
scripts.bump:prerelease: yarn prerelease:util; yarn prerelease:core; yarn prerelease:store; yarn prerelease:react; npm version prerelease --git-tag-version false; yarn tag:version
scripts.tag:version: VERSION=$(jq -r '.version' ./package.json); git add .; git commit -m "v$VERSION"; git tag -a "v$VERSION" -m "v$VERSION"
